def_cn: (飞机、汽车等的)残骸；（建筑物等的）废墟
def_en: When something such as a plane, car, or building has been destroyed, you can refer to what remains as wreckage or the wreckage .

def_cn: (计划等失败或遭到破坏后的)残余
def_en: If something such as a plan has failed or been spoilt completely, you can refer to what remains as the wreckage of it.
